name: EmployeeService
evidence: js/services/employeeService.js: defines service 'EmployeeService' with methods loadEmployees, getEmployeeById, calculateAverageSalary, addSkillToEmployee.
responsibility: Loads employee data with caching, retrieves an employee by id, calculates average salary of a list, and adds a skill to a specific employee.
outputs: returns boolean indicating skill addition success
sideEffects: writes to global window.employeeCache and window.lastLoadTime

name: FilterService
evidence: js/services/filterService.js: defines service 'FilterService' with methods buildSearchIndex, searchEmployees, matchesSearch, filterByDepartment.
responsibility: Builds a searchable text index for employees, performs text search, checks individual employee matches, and filters employees by department.

name: employeeCard
evidence: js/directives/employeeCard.js: returns directive definition object with restrict 'E', isolated scope, template string, and link function handling selectCard and $watch on employee.active.
responsibility: Renders an employee card UI, invokes a selection callback, highlights the card on click, and dims the card when the employee is inactive.
sideEffects: adds/removes CSS class 'highlight' on the card element
sets opacity style when employee.active becomes false
uses console indirectly via Angular bindings (none in code)

name: MainController
evidence: js/controllers/mainController.js: defines controller 'MainController' injecting $scope, EmployeeService, FilterService, $timeout and implements init, applyFilters, applySorting, selection handling, export, and a $watch on searchText.
responsibility: Initializes the app by loading employees, builds a search index, applies filters and sorting, manages employee selection, exports selected employees, and reacts to search input changes.
outputs: alerts user on errors or export actions

name: customCurrency
evidence: js/filters/currencyFormat.js: defines filter 'customCurrency' that formats a numeric input as a US dollar string with commas and two decimals.
responsibility: Formats a numeric value into a currency string with a leading '$', thousands separators, and two decimal places.

name: customDate
evidence: js/filters/dateFormat.js: defines filter 'customDate' that converts a YYYY-MM-DD string into 'Mon DD, YYYY' format.
responsibility: Converts an ISO‑like date string (YYYY‑MM‑DD) into a human‑readable format with abbreviated month name.

name: AppModuleDefinition
evidence: js/app.js: creates Angular module 'employeeApp' with no dependencies.
responsibility: Defines the root AngularJS module for the application.

name: GlobalConfigAndCache
evidence: js/app.js: sets window.APP_CONFIG with dataUrl, defaultSort, maxExportSize; initializes window.employeeCache and window.lastLoadTime to null.
responsibility: Provides global configuration values and cache placeholders used by services and controllers.
sideEffects: assigns properties on the global window object
